seo: 换行符替换,LF,CRLF,字符串处理,编码解码
seo_en: Line Feed,Carriage Return,String Processing,Codec Plugin,Encoding Decoding
summary: 该插件的核心意图是将输入内容中的换行符从LF格式统一转换为CRLF格式，用于标准化文本的换行符处理。
summary_en: The core intention of this plugin is to convert line breaks in the input content from LF format to CRLF format for text normalization.
